subject: Reseller
description_text:
hi

i would like to know how do i become  a reseller or agent for you in South
Africa.

thanks
shaun

conversations.body_text: Hi Shaun Olivier,  Please provide your cooperation model: is it dropshipping or local stock sales? Are the channels online or offline? Do you already have products on sale, and how are the sales performing?

hi

i will start with local and will like to try dropshipping aswell but not
sure how it work maybe you can help me with that.
im offline at the moment to wil advertise on discord channels.
i sold a local direct drive bases in south africa that didnt sold to bad.
you will be the first international brand that i want to try and sell in
south africa

i want to start selling more sim racing stuff.


thanks
shaun


On Mon, Dec 22, 2025 at 2:40 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Shaun Olivier,  Our official website allows you to apply for affiliate sales. You can refer to it and register. By promoting through the affiliate program, you can earn commissions.

ok thank you will have a look.

if i want to do local buy from you to resell in south africa

On Mon, Dec 22, 2025 at 2:50 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Shaun Olivier,  Please let me know which products you would like to purchase and the quantity of each.
I want to buy 1 3 pedal set and ons 2 pedal set.
Hi Shaun Olivier,     You can place your order through our Alibaba platform, and our sales representative can prepare the order for you at wholesale prices.   https://www.alibaba.com/x/iIXBR?ck=pdp

Hi

Ok thanks you will do
